Lavvakcesaa's Census of Ettere Diffyt

Sansa Óndatel • February 3, 2025

Last updated: 3 February 2025, 22:10 RST

Lavvakcesaa has recently declared completion of a census of Ettere Diffyt. It found today a shocking development: the population of Ettere Diffyt is zero.

The only source for this claim is complaints over leader Sven using "we" when Ettere Diffyt doesn't have enough people to refer to a "we." Some have said this could be a royal we, but this is unconfirmed.

Regardless, the Port of Eras officially broke the news that Ettere Diffyt's population is zero.
